summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 20, Bell & Denny's 1st Addition, being the alley between 1st Avenue and 2nd Avenue, from Vine Street to Cedar Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; in accordance with Resolution No. 9566 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of " Payment in Bonds".
